FuncDef: This command displays the scheduler hierarchy per subscriber.
CLIs: subscriber <sub-ident-string> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> sap <sap-id> [ scheduler <scheduler-name> ] [ detail ] [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

ParaDef.Info: Displays the subscriber identification policy name.
Displays ingress SAP subscriber scheduler stats.
Displays egress SAP subscriber scheduler stats.
Displays information for the specified sla-profile-name.
Displays subscriber scheduler hierarchy information for sessions with the specified SLA Profile Instance sharing type. Values-per-group, per-session-ipoe, per-session-ppp.
Displays subscriber scheduler hierarchy information for sessions with the specified SLA Profile Instance sharing type and sharing identifier. The spi-sharing-id is:.
